definition: A person who acts on behalf of someone else, representing their interests or carrying out tasks on their behalf. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who represent a company, organization, or group in various contexts, such as sales representatives, delegates, or agents.

examples.german: Er ist ein Vertreter der Firma.
examples.english: He is a representative of the company.

examples.german: Der Vertreter hat uns ein Angebot gemacht.
examples.english: The representative made us an offer.

examples.german: Sie ist die Vertreterin des Kunden.
examples.english: She is the representative of the customer.

examples.german: Der Vertreter besucht regelmäßig die Geschäftspartner.
examples.english: The representative regularly visits the business partners.

examples.german: Die Vertreterin hat die Verträge unterzeichnet.
